```coq
intros net e h. 
intros one_vote_per_term_cronies votes_received_cronies candidateEntries_currentTerm_type.
destruct candidateEntries_currentTerm_type as [h' [won_election [currentTerm_eTerm type_neq_Candidate]]].
rewrite <- currentTerm_eTerm in *. 
assert (type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader \/ type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate) as type_eq_Leader_or_Candidate.
{ apply votes_received_cronies with (crony:=h'); auto. }
destruct type_eq_Leader_or_Candidate as [type_eq_Leader | type_eq_Candidate].
- contradiction type_neq_Candidate; auto.
- auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros net e h. intros one_vote_per_term_cronies votes_received_cronies candidateEntries_currentTerm_type. destruct candidateEntries_currentTerm_type as [h' [won_election [currentTerm_eTerm type_neq_Candidate]]]. rewrite <- currentTerm_eTerm in *. assert (type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader \/ type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate) as type_eq_Leader_or_Candidate. { apply votes_received_cronies with (crony:=h'); auto. } destruct type_eq_Leader_or_Candidate as [type_eq_Leader | type_eq_Candidate]. - contradiction type_neq_Candidate; auto. - auto.
